name: PixelRacer Jam Edition
description:
A little top-down pixel-art racing Game developed for the DevGO Game Jam.

The Game is made WITHOUT any Game Engine, it's just C++ and a Graphics Library.

The Game also has a GitHub repo: https://github.com/Mad-Mushroom/Pixel-Racer

The Game will be continued developing, but this is the version submitted to the Jam.

Have Fun :D
